result.name: delivery_directorate_performance_report
result.notes:
Contract performance for Contracted Employment Provision. Initial releases contained Flexible New Deal (FND) figures for starts and jobs broken down by contract package area.
NOTE: As of 1 June 2011 there have been no new referrals to FND, the intention was no payments for outcomes after 2 July 2011.  Since then the decision was made to pay for outcomes up to 1st September 2011 so a final report capturing these outcomes was published on 16 November 2011.
https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/delivery-directorate-performance-report

Source agency: Work and Pensions

Designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics

Language: English

Alternative title: DWP Contract performance for Contracted Employment Provision

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Delivery Directorate Performance Report
